thread.section_title: Sunday Afternoons Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Sunday Afternoons | www.sundayafternoons.com
thread.title: Katy

author: Katy
title: Katy
text:
I bought this hat expecting the same thing I expect with every hat I purchase - it won't REALLY fit. I have a larger head for a woman, usually about 1/3 to 1/2 inch larger than the circumference most women's hat are made in. But because of a recent visit to the doctor, I am to stay out of the sun, so a hat is a must.
Needless to say, this hat has exceeded every expectation!! It fits so nicely, and is a stretchy, breathable material so my head doesn't feel like it's in a corset. The brim is large but fashionable - I've worn this hat with dresses, t shirts, etc. and I love it.
From now on I will always buy hats from Sunday Afternoons! I am so impressed. I have nothing negative to say.
